question_id,
title,
difficulty,

question_tags,

mapper.update:
update qmoj_question
question_id = #{questionId,jdbcType=INTEGER},
title = #{title,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
difficulty = #{difficulty,jdbcType=TINYINT},
create_time = #{createTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
modify_time = #{modifyTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
platform = #{platform,jdbcType=TINYINT},
question_slug = #{questionSlug,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
content = #{content,jdbcType=LONGVARCHAR},
lang_to_valid_playground = #{langToValidPlayground,jdbcType=LONGVARCHAR},
question_tags = #{topicTags,jdbcType=LONGVARCHAR},
where id = #{id,jdbcType=BIGINT}

update qmoj_question set question_id = #{questionId,jdbcType=INTEGER}, title = #{title,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, difficulty = #{difficulty,jdbcType=TINYINT}, create_time = #{createTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, modify_time = #{modifyTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, platform = #{platform,jdbcType=TINYINT}, question_slug = #{questionSlug,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, content = #{content,jdbcType=LONGVARCHAR}, lang_to_valid_playground = #{langToValidPlayground,jdbcType=LONGVARCHAR}, question_tags = #{topicTags,jdbcType=LONGVARCHAR} where id = #{id,jdbcType=BIGINT}

update qmoj_question set question_id = #{questionId,jdbcType=INTEGER}, title = #{title,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, difficulty = #{difficulty,jdbcType=TINYINT}, create_time = #{createTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, modify_time = #{modifyTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, platform = #{platform,jdbcType=TINYINT}, question_slug = #{questionSlug,jdbcType=VARCHAR} where id = #{id,jdbcType=BIGINT}
